org.apache.commons.net.ntp
NTP - network time protocol

  • Uses of NtpV3Packet in org.apache.commons.net.ntp

    Classes in org.apache.commons.net.ntp that implement NtpV3Packet
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    NtpV3Impl
    Implements NtpV3Packet to convert Java objects to and from the Network Time Protocol (NTP) data message header format described in RFC-1305.
